name: xkcdcomics
0:
”Alexa, start x. k. c. d. comics.”
”Alexa, open x. k. c. d. comics.”
”Alexa, launch x. k. c. d. comics.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: x. k. c. d. comics
des: This skill reads xkcd comics aloud and provides the illustration in the skill cards. You can hear today's comic, select a previous comic, or listen to a random comic on demand. Just say start xkcd to get started!
